summary: AN ORDINANCE adding new sections 21.10.215, 21.04.655 and 21.32.655 and amending Sections 21.06.140, 21.10.200 and 21.28.300 of the City Traffic Code (Ordinance 91910) in order to authorize establishment of restricted parking zones with special parking privileges for vehicles owned, used, or serving nearby residents, and providing for implementing regulations, procedures and the enforcement of parking restrictions.
